name: 2 Ingredient Blueberry Ice Cream
description: This 2 ingredient blueberry ice cream with coconut chips and granola is the perfect treat for summer days! It's ready in 5 minutes and it's super healthy!
recipeIngredient: 2  ripe bananas, sliced and frozen overnight

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the bananas into pieces and freeze them for a couple of hours,  or preferably overnight.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut the bananas into pieces and freeze them for a couple of hours,  or preferably overnight.

recipeInstructions.text: Then put them in a blender together with the frozen blueberries and process until smooth. Use the pulse function and scrape down the sides if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Then put them in a blender together with the frozen blueberries and process until smooth. Use the pulse function and scrape down the sides if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Top it off with fresh berries (blueberries, raspberries, and strawberries), coconut chips, and granola.
recipeInstructions.name: Top it off with fresh berries (blueberries, raspberries, and strawberries), coconut chips, and granola.
